entry.title: Friday: Light snow. Temperature falling to minus 18 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Light snow ending late this morning then cloudy. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this morning. Temperature falling to minus 18 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 26. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind becoming east 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 20 January 2023
